title: Ticket #5871: Remove obsolete knobs from param table before 8.6 release
description: The UWCS_* knobs and TESTINGMODE_* knobs should be moved from the param table into a metaknob so that they don't clutter up condor_config_val -dump output. Making them a metaknob will make them still available for those that wish to use them (anyone?)
remarks:
2016-Aug-26 09:41:04 by johnkn:
Removal of these knobs should be mentioned in the 8.6 upgrade notes.

2016-Sep-19 11:44:40 by johnkn:
UWCS_* knobs removed from param table, if needed by user config, they can be added back in by configuring. 

   use Feature : UWCS_DESKTOP_POLICY_VALUES

TESTINGMODE_* knobs removed from param table, if needed by user config, they can be added back in by configuring. 

    use Feature : TESTINGMODE_POLICY_VALUES

2016-Sep-20 14:27:17 by wenger:
Argh -- that commit should have said "Fixed version history message", not "Fixed usage message".
check_ins:
2016-Sep-20 14:22   Check-in [49245]: Gittrac #5871: Fixed usage message. (By Kent Wenger )
2016-Sep-20 14:03   Check-in [49242]: version history for #5871, #5873, #5818, and #5839 (By John (TJ) Knoeller )
2016-Aug-26 09:25   Check-in [49080]: Param table cleanup. #5871. move UWCS_* and TESTINGMODE_* knobs to metaknobs mark some constant knobs as constants. set MaxJobRetirementTime for the ALWAYS_RUN_JOBS policy to max_int. (By John (TJ) Knoeller )
creator: johnkn
